TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: XML Paper Specification (XPS) の パーツを XPS パッケージに追加するためのメソッドを定義します。

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`DocumentStructure`の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、9 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] の パーツを [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] パッケージに追加します

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

returns.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] パッケージの パーツを表す 。

span.span: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細については、`DocumentStructure`の要素、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]パッケージ、9 の章を参照してください、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]で入手可能仕様[XPS: 仕様とライセンスのダウンロード](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)です。For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
